row.description: The advanced understanding of planet evolution allowing you to interpret data from scans of planets for resources at much higher resolutions. Bonus: The skill further increases the resolution of resource data when scanning a planet to allow for very precise surveying. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

The understanding of planet evolution allowing you to better interpret data from scans of planets for resources. Bonus: The skill increases the resolution of resource data when scanning a planet to allow for more accurate surveying.
For each level in this skill, you may install a command center on one additional planet, to a maximum of 6 planets. You can have only one command center per planet.
Each level in this skill improves the quality of command facility available to you, in turn allowing for a greater number of connected facilities on that planet.
Skill at operating ORE industrial ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Basic turret operation skill. 2% Bonus to weapon turrets' rate of fire per skill level.
Operation of small hybrid turrets. 5% Bonus to small hybrid turret damage per level.
Operation of small projectile turrets. 5% Bonus to small projectile turret damage per level.
Operation of small energy turrets. 5% Bonus to small energy turret damage per level.
Operation of medium hybrid turrets. 5% Bonus to medium hybrid turret damage per level.
Operation of medium projectile turrets. 5% Bonus to medium projectile turret damage per level.
Operation of medium energy turret. 5% Bonus to medium energy turret damage per level.
Operation of large hybrid turret. 5% Bonus to large hybrid turret damage per level.
Operation of large projectile turret. 5% Bonus to large projectile turret damage per level.
Operation of large energy turrets. 5% Bonus to large energy turret damage per level.
Skill at the rapid discharge of weapon turrets. 4% bonus per skill level to weapon turret rate of fire.
Skill at long-range weapon turret firing. 5% bonus to weapon turret optimal range per skill level.
Improved ability at hitting moving targets. 5% bonus per skill level to weapon turret tracking speeds.
Knowledge of spaceships' structural weaknesses. 3% bonus per skill level to the damage of all weapon turrets.
Allows better control over the capacitor use of weapon turrets. 5% reduction in capacitor need of weapon turrets per skill level.
Advanced understanding of zero-G physics. 5% bonus per skill level to weapon turret accuracy falloff.
Knowledge of gunnery computer systems, including the use of weapon upgrade modules. 5% reduction per skill level in the CPU needs of weapon turrets, launchers and smartbombs.
Basic operation of missile launcher systems. 2% Bonus to missile launcher rate of fire per skill level.
Skill with small short range missiles. Special: 5% bonus to rocket damage per skill level.
Skill with manually targeted missiles. Special: 5% Bonus to light missile damage per skill level.
Skill with auto-targeting missiles. Special: 5% bonus to Auto-Targeting Missiles(light, heavy and cruise) damage per skill level.
Skill with anti-missile missiles. Special: 5% bonus to defender missile max velocity per skill level.
Skill with heavy missiles. Special: 5% bonus to heavy missile damage per skill level.
Skill at the handling and firing of torpedoes. 5% bonus to torpedo damage per skill level.
Skill at the handling and firing of very large guided missiles. 5% bonus to cruise missile damage per skill level.
The basic operation of spaceships. 2% improved ship agility for all ships per skill level.
Skill at operating Gallente frigates.
Skill at operating Minmatar frigates.
Skill at operating Caldari frigates.
Skill at operating Amarr frigates.
Skill at operating Gallente cruisers.
Skill at operating Minmatar cruisers.
Skill at operating Caldari cruisers.
Skill at operating Amarr cruisers.
Skill at operating Gallente battleships.
Skill at operating Minmatar battleships.
Skill at operating Caldari battleships.
Skill at operating Amarr battleships.
Skill at operating Gallente industrial ships.
Skill at operating Minmatar industrial ships.
Skill at operating Caldari industrial ships.
Skill at operating Amarr industrial ships.
Skill at operating Gallente titans. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Minmatar titans. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Caldari titans. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Amarr titans. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Allows command of a squadron. Increases maximum squadron size by 2 members per skill level, up to a maximum of 10 members. Grants a 2% bonus to fleet members' targeting speed per skill level. Only the bonus of the fleet member with the highest level in this skill is used.
Note: The fleet bonus only works if you are the assigned fleet booster and fleet members are in space within the same solar system.

Basic proficiency at coordinating hit-and-run warfare. Grants a 2% bonus to fleet members' agility per skill level.
Note: The fleet bonus only works if you are the assigned fleet booster and fleet members are in space within the same solar system.

Basic proficiency at coordinating a fleet's defenses. Grants a 2% bonus to fleet members' shield capacity per skill level.
Note: The fleet bonus only works if you are the assigned fleet booster and fleet members are in space within the same solar system.
Advanced proficiency at siege warfare. Boosts the effectiveness of siege warfare link modules by 20% per skill level.
Advanced proficiency at information warfare. Boosts the effectiveness of information warfare link modules by 20% per skill level.
Improved fleet leadership. Boosts effectiveness of all warfare link and mining foreman modules by 10% per level.
Skill at social interaction. 5% bonus per level to NPC agent, corporation and faction standing increase.
Skill at agent negotiation. 5% additional pay per skill level for agent missions.

Skill at interacting with hostile Agents in order to de-escalate tense situations as demonstrated by some of the finest diplomats in New Eden. 4% Modifier per level to effective standing towards hostile Agents. Not cumulative with Connections or Criminal Connections.
Skill at interacting with Concord. 5% Bonus to effective security rating increase.
Skill at interacting with friendly NPCs. 4% Modifier to effective standing from friendly NPC Corporations and Factions per level. Not cumulative with Diplomacy or Criminal Connections.
Skill at interacting with friendly criminal NPCs. 4% Modifier per level to effective standing towards NPCs with low Concord standing. Not cumulative with Diplomacy or Connections.
Skill at dealing with Concord Department and negotiating bounties Bonus fee of 1,500 isk per pirate head per level of the skill
Basic corporation operation. +20 corporation members allowed per level. Notice: the CEO must update his corporation through the corporation user interface before the skill takes effect
The operation and management of spacestations.
Skill at setting up Starbases
Skill at factory operation.
Skill at managing station refineries. Increases mineral yield of refinery by 5% if acting as station manager.
Skill at negotiating ally fees with Concord. Reduces cost to hire allies in wars by 5% per level.
Skill at managing corp finances. 5% discount on all fees at non-hostile NPC station if acting as CFO of a corp.
Skill at managing corp research.
Skill at managing corporate offices.
Skill at directing a corporation's espionage division.
Skill at using starbase weapon systems. Allows control of one array per level. Arrays must be placed outside of the forcefield to be controlled. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Allows basic operation of factories. 4% reduction in manufacturing time per skill level.
Grants +5% reduction in Amarr equipment production time.
Grants +5% reduction in Caldari equipment production time.
Grants +5% reduction in Gallente equipment production time.
Grants +5% reduction in Minmatar equipment production time.
Skill at using reprocessing facilities in station, outposts and starbases to break ores and ice down into refined products. 3% bonus to ore and ice reprocessing yield per skill level.
Skill at using mining lasers. 5% bonus to mining turret yield per skill level.
Allows the operation of multiple factories. Ability to run 1 additional manufacturing job per level.
Skill at efficiently using industrial facilities. 3% reduction in all manufacturing and research times per skill level.
Advanced skill at using reprocessing facilities in station, outposts and starbases to break ores and ice down into refined products. 2% bonus to ore and ice reprocessing yield per skill level.
Unknown
Unknown
Skill at maintaining the mechanical components and structural integrity of a spaceship. 5% bonus to structure hit points per skill level.
Operation of armor/hull repair modules. 5% reduction in repair systems duration per skill level. Note: Has no effect on capital sized modules.
Skill at maintaining your ship's armor and installing hull upgrades like expanded cargoholds and inertial stabilizers. Grants a 5% bonus to armor hit points per skill level.
Skill required for the manufacturing of advanced frigates and destroyers. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Advanced Small Ship Construction per level.
Skill required for the manufacturing of advanced industrial ships. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Advanced Industrial Ship Construction per level.
Skill required for the manufacturing of advanced cruisers and battlecruisers. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Advanced Medium Ship Construction per level.
Skill required for the manufacturing of advanced battleships. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Advanced Large Ship Construction per level.
Skill required for the manufacturing of player controllable outposts.
Basic understanding of scientific principles. 5% Bonus to blueprint copying speed per level.
Skill at researching more efficient production methods. 5% bonus to blueprint manufacturing time research per skill level.
The science of life and of living organisms, and how chemicals affect them. 20% Bonus to attribute booster duration per skill level.
Allows basic operation of research facilities. Ability to run 1 additional research job per skill level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Understanding of the techniques and methods to reverse engineer Sleeper technology.
Advanced knowledge of mineral composition. 5% Bonus to material efficiency research speed per skill level.
Skill at analyzing the content of celestial objects with the intent of mining them. 5% bonus to mining turret yield per skill level.
The science of interfacing biological and machine components. Allows the use of cybernetic implants.
Skill at operating long range scanners. +5% scan strength per level. -5% max scan deviation per level. -5% scan probe scan time per level.
Basic understanding of spaceship energy grid systems. 5% Bonus to ship's powergrid output per skill level.
Skill at operating a spaceship's shield systems, including the use of shield boosters and other basic shield modules. 5% reduction in shield recharge time per skill level.
Skill at operating your ship's capacitor, including the use of capacitor boosters and other basic energy modules. 5% reduction in capacitor recharge time per skill level.
Skill at regulating your ship's overall energy capacity. 5% bonus to capacitor capacity per skill level.
Skill at regulating a spaceship's shield systems. 5% bonus to shield capacity per skill level.

Skill at preventing damage from penetrating the shield, including the use of shield hardeners and other advanced shield modules. Reduces the chance of damage penetrating the shield when it falls below 25% by 5% per skill level, with 0% chance at level 5.
Skill at using smartbombs. 5% decrease in smartbomb duration per skill level.
Operation of shield transfer array and other shield emission systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for shield emission system modules per skill level.
Operation of energy transfer array and other energy emission systems. 5% reduced capacitor need of energy emission weapons per skill level.
Skill at installing power upgrades e.g. capacitor battery and power diagnostic units. 5% reduction in CPU needs of modules requiring Energy Grid Upgrades per skill level.
Skill at installing shield upgrades e.g. shield extenders and shield rechargers. 5% reduction in shield upgrade powergrid needs.
Basic understanding of spaceship sensory and computer systems. 5% Bonus to ship CPU output per skill level.
Operation of ECM jamming systems. 5% less capacitor need for ECM and ECM Burst systems per skill level. Note: Does not affect capital class modules.
Skill at long range targeting. 5% Bonus to targeting range per skill level.
Skill at targeting multiple targets. +1 extra target per skill level, up to the ship's maximum allowed number of targets locked.
Skill at targeting multiple targets. +1 extra target per skill level, up to the ship's maximum allowed number of targets locked.
Skill at operating Targeting systems. 5% improved targeting speed per skill level.
Skill at installing electronic upgrades, such as signal amplifiers, co-processors and backup sensor arrays. 5% reduction of CPU needs for all modules requiring Electronics Upgrades per skill level.
Skill at using remote sensor booster/damper. 5% less capacitor need for sensor link per skill level.
Skill at using remote weapon disruptors. 5% less capacitor need for weapon disruptors per skill level.
Skill at using propulsion/warpdrive jammers. 5% Reduction to Warp Scrambler, Warp Disruptor, and Stasis Web capacitor need per skill level.
Skill at remote controlling drones. Can operate 1 drone per skill level.
Skill at control range for all drones. Bonus: drone control range increased by 5000 meters per skill level.
Skill at controlling mining drones. 5% bonus to mining drone yield per skill level.
Allows operation of logistic drones. 5% increased repair amount per level.
Skill at controlling salvage drones. 2% increased salvage chance per level.
Skill at controlling heavy combat drones. 5% bonus to heavy drone damage per level.

Allows a captain to better maintain his drones.
10% bonus to drone damage and drone mining yield per level.
Knowledge of the market and skill at manipulating it. Active buy/sell order limit increased by 4 per level of skill.
Ability to organize and manage market operations. Each level raises the limit of active orders by 8. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at forging cargo manifests and disguising contraband cargo. From a base of 90%, each level of skill reduces chance of contraband detection by 10%.

Proficiency at driving down market-related costs. Each level of skill grants a 5% reduction in the costs associated with setting up a market order, which usually come to 1% of the order's total value. This can be further influenced by the player's standing towards the owner of the station where the order is entered.

Skill at acquiring products remotely. Each level of skill increases the range your remote buy orders are effective to from their origin station. Level 1 allows for the placing of remote buy orders with a range limited to the same solar system, Level 2 extends that range to systems within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level then doubles it. Level 5 allows for a full regional range. Note: Only remotely placed buy orders (using Procurement) require this skill to alter the range. Any range can be set on a local buy order with no skill.
Proficiency at laying low and avoiding unwanted attention. From a base of 90%, each level of skill reduces by 10% the likelihood of being scanned while transporting contraband.
Skill at regulating the power output of ship thrusters. 5% bonus to sub-warp ship velocity per skill level.
Skill at using afterburners. 5% reduction to Afterburner duration and 10% reduction in Afterburner capacitor use per skill level.
Skill at improved control over afterburner energy consumption. 10% reduction in afterburner capacitor needs per skill level.
Skill at efficiently using Afterburners and MicroWarpdrives. 5% Bonus to Afterburner and MicroWarpdrive speed boost per skill level.
Improved skill at efficiently turning and accelerating a spaceship. 5% improved ship agility for all ships per skill level.
Skill at using MicroWarpdrives. 5% reduction in MicroWarpdrive capacitor usage per skill level.
Skill at managing warp drive efficiency. 10% reduction in capacitor need of initiating warp per skill level.
Skill at using Jump Drives. 5% reduction in capacitor need of initiating a jump per skill level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating ship, cargo and survey scanners. 5% improvement per level in the scan speeds of those module types.

Advanced corporation operation. +100 members per level. Notice: the CEO must update his corporation through the corporation user interface before the skill takes effect. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Advanced corporation operation. +400 corporation members allowed per level. Notice: the CEO must update his corporation through the corporation user interface before the skill takes effect. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Unknown
Unknown
Understanding of corporate culture on the industrial level and the plight of the worker. Improves loyalty point gain by 10% per level when working for agents in the Mining corporation division.
Understanding of the way trade is conducted at the corporate level. Improves loyalty point gain by 10% per level when working for agents in the Distribution corporation division.
Understanding of military culture. Improves loyalty point gain by 10% per level when working for agents in the Security corporation division.
Skill at using Micro Jump Drives. 5% reduction in activation time per skill level.

Improves the continuous reflection of active target spectrum breakers, resulting in much improved defenses against all those who wish to target any vessel in the vicinity. Reduces duration time and capacitor need of Target Spectrum Breakers by 5% per level.
Skill at operating Polaris ships.
Skill at operating Concord.
This is a test skill and should never appear in the live game
Skill at operating Jovian industrial ships.
Skill at operating jove battleships.

Specialist training in the operation of advanced small railguns. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of small turrets requiring Small Railgun Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialist training in the operation of small Beam Lasers. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of small turrets requiring Small Beam Laser Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialist training in the operation of advanced small Autocannons. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of small turrets requiring Small Autocannon Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Advanced Skill at installing power upgrades e.g. capacitor battery and power diagnostic units. a further a further 2% reduction in energy grid upgrade CPU needs.
Skill at installing shield upgrades e.g. shield extenders and shield rechargers. 2% reduction in shield upgrade power needs.
Reduces the powergrid needs of weapon turrets and launchers by 2% per skill level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Advanced skill at installing sensor upgrades, e.g. signal amplifier and backup sensor array. further 2% reduction of sensor upgrade CPU needs per skill level.

Skill at operating mining lasers requiring Deep Core Mining. 20% reduction per skill level in the chance of a damage cloud forming while mining Mercoxit. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Skill and knowledge of High Energy Physics and its use in the development of advanced technology. Used primarily in the research of various energy system modules as well as smartbombs and laser based weaponry. Allows High Energy Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring High Energy Physics per level. Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

Skill and knowledge of Plasma physics and its use in the development of advanced technology. Used primarily in the research of particle blaster weaponry as well as plasma based missiles and smartbombs. Allows Plasma Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Plasma Physics per level. Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

Skill and knowledge of Nanite Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. Used primarily in the research of various armor and hull systems. Allows Nanite Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Nanite Engineering per level. Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

Skill and knowledge of Hydromagnetic Physics and its use in the development of advanced technology . Used primarily in the research of shield system. Allows Hydromagnetic Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent. Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Hydromagnetic Physics per level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Skill and knowledge of Amarr Starship Engineering. Used Exclusively in the research of Amarr Ships of all Sizes. Allows Amarr Starship Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Amarr Starship Engineering per level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Skill and knowledge of Minmatar Starship Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. Used in the research of Minmatar Ships of all Sizes. Allows Minmatar Starship Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Minmatar Starship Engineering per level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Skill and knowledge of Graviton physics and its use in the development of advanced technology. Used primarily in the research of Cloaking and other spatial distortion devices as well as Graviton based missiles and smartbombs. Allows Graviton Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent. Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Graviton Physics per level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Skill and knowledge of Laser Physics and its use in the development of advanced Technology. Used primarily in the research of Laser weaponry as well as EM based missiles and smartbombs. Allows Laser Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Laser Physics per level. Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Skill and knowledge of Electromagnetic Physics and its use in the development of advanced technology. Used primarily in the research of Railgun weaponry and various electronic systems. Allows Electromagnetic Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent. Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Electromagnetic Physics per level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Skill and knowledge of Rocket Science and its use in the development of advanced technology. Used primarily in the research of missiles and propulsion systems. Allows Rocket Science research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Rocket Science per level. Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Skill and knowledge of Gallente Starship Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. Used in the research of Gallente Ships of all Sizes. Allows Gallente Starship Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Gallente Starship Engineering per level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Skill and knowledge of Nuclear physics and its use in the development of advanced technology. Used primarily in the research of Projectile weaponry as well as Nuclear missiles and smartbombs. Allows Nuclear Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Nuclear Physics per level. Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Skill and knowledge of Mechanical Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. Used in all Starship research as well as hull and armor repair systems. Allows Mechanical Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Mechanical Engineering per level. Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Skill and knowledge of Electronic Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. Used in all Electronics and Drone research. Allows Electronic Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Electronic Engineering per level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Skill and knowledge of Caldari Starship Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. Used in the research of Caldari Ships of all Sizes. Allows Caldari Starship Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Caldari Starship Engineering per level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Skill and knowledge of Quantum Physics and its use in the development of advanced Technology. Used primarily in the research of shield systems and Particle Blasters. Allows Quantum Physics research to be performed through a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Quantum Physics per level. Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Skill and knowledge of Astronautics and its use in the development of advanced technology. This skill has no practical application for capsuleers, and proficiency in its use conveys little more than bragging rights. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Skill and knowledge of Molecular Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. Used primarily in the research of various hull and propulsion systems. Allows Molecular Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Molecular Engineering per level. Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
5% bonus to thermal resistance per level for Shield Amplifiers
Advanced proficiency at armored warfare. Boosts the effectiveness of armored warfare link modules by 20% per skill level.
Advanced proficiency at skirmish warfare. Boosts the effectiveness of skirmish warfare link modules by 20% per skill level.
Grants the Wing Commander the ability to pass on their bonuses to an additional Squadron per skill level, up to a maximum of 5 Squadrons. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at using Cloaking devices. 10% reduction in targeting delay after uncloaking per skill level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at Anchoring Deployables.
Skill and knowledge of Hypernet Technology such as Hacking decks, Codebreakers and Parasites.
Skill for operation of Interceptors. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Covert operations frigates are designed for recon and espionage operation. Their main strength is the ability to travel unseen through enemy territory and to avoid unfavorable encounters Much of their free space is sacrificed to house an advanced spatial field control system. This allows it to utilize very advanced forms of cloaking at greatly reduced CPU cost. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill for operation of the Assault Frigates. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill for operation of Logistics cruisers. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill for the operation of Destroyers.
Skill for operation of Interdictors. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Battlecruisers. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at overseeing agent research and development projects. Allows the simultaneous use of 1 additional Research and Development agent per skill level.

Specialization in Arkonor reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 2% bonus to Arkonor reprocessing yield per skill level.

Specialization in Bistot reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 2% bonus to Bistot reprocessing yield per skill level.

Specialization in Crokite reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 2% bonus to Crokite reprocessing yield per skill level.

Specialization in Dark Ochre reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 2% bonus to Dark Ochre reprocessing yield per skill level.

Specialization in Gneiss reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 2% bonus to Gneiss reprocessing yield per skill level.

Specialization in Hedbergite reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 2% bonus to Hedbergite reprocessing yield per skill level.

Specialization in Hemorphite reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 2% bonus to Hemorphite reprocessing yield per skill level.

Specialization in Jaspet reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 2% bonus to Jaspet reprocessing yield per skill level.

Specialization in Kernite reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 2% bonus to Kernite reprocessing yield per skill level.

Specialization in Mercoxit reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 2% bonus to Mercoxit reprocessing yield per skill level.

Specialization in Omber reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 2% bonus to Omber reprocessing yield per skill level.

Specialization in Plagioclase reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 2% bonus to Plagioclase reprocessing yield per skill level.

Specialization in Pyroxeres reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 2% bonus to Pyroxeres reprocessing yield per skill level.

Specialization in Scordite reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 2% bonus to Scordite reprocessing yield per skill level.

Specialization in Spodumain reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 2% bonus to Spodumain reprocessing yield per skill level.

Specialization in Veldspar reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard refining facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 2% bonus to Veldspar reprocessing yield per skill level.

Specialization in Scrapmetal reprocessing. Increases reprocessing returns for modules, ships and other reprocessable equipment (but not ore and ice). 2% bonus to ship and module reprocessing yield per skill level.

Specialist training in the operation of advanced Small Artillery. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of small turrets requiring Small Artillery Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialist training in the operation of advanced Medium Artillery. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of medium turrets requiring Medium Artillery Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialist training in the operation of advanced Large Artillery. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of large turrets requiring Large Artillery Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialist training in the operation of advanced medium beam lasers. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of medium turrets requiring Medium Beam Laser Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialist training in the operation of advanced large beam lasers. 2% Bonus per skill level to the damage of large turrets requiring Large Beam Laser Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialist training in the operation of advanced medium railguns. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of medium turrets requiring Medium Railgun Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialist training in the operation of advanced large railguns. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of large turrets requiring Large Railgun Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialist training in the operation of advanced medium autocannons. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of medium turrets requiring Medium Autocannon Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialist training in the operation of advanced large autocannons. 2% Bonus per skill level to the damage of large turrets requiring Large Autocannon Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialist training in the operation of advanced small blasters. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of small turrets requiring Small Blaster Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialist training in the operation of advanced medium blasters. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of medium turrets requiring Medium Blaster Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialist training in the operation of advanced large blasters. 2% Bonus per skill level to the damage of large turrets requiring Large Blaster Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialist training in the operation of small pulse lasers. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of small turrets requiring Small Pulse Laser Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialist training in the operation of advanced medium pulse lasers. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of medium turrets requiring Medium Pulse Laser Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialist training in the operation of advanced large pulse lasers. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of large turrets requiring Large Pulse Laser Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Advanced corporation operation. +2000 corporation members allowed per level. Notice: the CEO must update his corporation through the corporation user interface before the skill takes effect. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at controlling drones at high speeds. 5% increase in drone max velocity per level.
5% bonus to EM resistance per level for Shield Amplifiers
5% bonus to kinetic resistance per level for Shield Amplifiers
5% bonus to explosive resistance per level for Shield Amplifiers
Skill at navigating while cloaked. 20% per level bonus to cloaked velocity per skill level.
Proficiency at long-range missile combat. 10% bonus to all missiles' maximum flight time per level.
Skill at boosting missile bay trigger circuits and enhancing guided missiles' ignition systems. 10% bonus to all missiles' maximum velocity per level.

Specialization in the operation of advanced Amarr drones. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of light, medium, heavy and sentry drones requiring Amarr Drone Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialization in the operation of advanced Minmatar drones. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of light, medium, heavy and sentry drones requiring Minmatar Drone Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialization in the operation of advanced Gallente drones. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of light, medium, heavy and sentry drones requiring Gallente Drone Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialization in the operation of advanced Caldari drones. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of light, medium, heavy and sentry drones requiring Caldari Drone Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at the stowage and transportation of bulk goods 5% Bonus per level to Ship Cargo Capacity
The skill at transporting contraband without getting caught. -10% chance of being caught transporting contraband. Base chance 60%.
The skill at transporting contraband without getting caught. -10% chance of being caught transporting contraband. Base chance 60%.
The skill at transporting contraband without getting caught. -10% chance of being caught transporting contraband. Base chance 60%.
The skill at transporting contraband without getting caught. -10% chance of being caught transporting contraband. Base chance 60%.
The skill at transporting contraband without getting caught. -10% chance of being caught transporting contraband. Base chance 60%.
The skill at transporting contraband without getting caught. -10% chance of being caught transporting contraband. Base chance 60%.
The skill at transporting contraband without getting caught. -10% chance of being caught transporting contraband. Base chance 60%.
Proficiency at identifying and analyzing ancient artifacts. Required skill for the use of Relic Analyzer modules. Gives +10 Virus Coherence per level.

The ability to gather and analyze remote sensing data from satellites in orbit around a planet and produce properly calibrated surveys. Level 1: allows scans within 1 ly Level 2: allows scans within 3 ly Level 3: allows scans within 5 ly Level 4: allows scans within 7 ly Level 5: allows scans within 9 ly
Operation of remote armor repair systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for remote armor repair system modules per skill level.
Skill at harvesting ice. 5% reduction per skill level to the cycle time of ice harvesters.
Skill for operation of Heavy Assault Cruisers. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Proficiency at placing remote buy orders on the market. Level 1 allows for the placement of orders within the same solar system, Level 2 extends that range to systems within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level then doubles it. Level 5 allows for placement of remote buy orders anywhere within current region. Note: placing buy orders and directly buying an item are not the same thing. Direct remote purchase requires no skill.

Allows for remote modification of buy and sell orders. Each level of skill increases the range at which orders may be modified. Level 1 allows for modification of orders within the same solar system, Level 2 extends that range to systems within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level then doubles it. Level 5 allows for market order modification anywhere within current region.
Ability to organize and manage large-scale market operations. Each level raises the limit of active orders by 16. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Ability to make potentially risky investments work in your favor. Each level of skill reduces the percentage of ISK placed in market escrow when entering buy orders. Starting with an escrow percentage of 100% at Level 0 (untrained skill), each skill level cumulatively reduces the percentage by 25%. This will bring your total escrow down to approximately 24% at level 5. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Skill at selling items remotely. Each level increases the range from the seller to the item being sold. Level 1 allows for the sale of items within the same solar system, Level 2 extends that range to systems within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level then doubles it. Level 5 allows for sale of items located anywhere within current region.
Proficiency at squaring away the odds and ends of business transactions, keeping the check books tight. Each level of skill reduces transaction tax by 10%.
Skill at operating ORE Mining Barges. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill for Ice reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency. 2% bonus to Ice reprocessing yield per skill level.
Ability to organize and manage ultra large-scale market operations. Each level raises the limit of active orders by 32. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Those who possess this are all knowing and all seeing with unlimited power and authority.
Skill for operation of Transport Ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Skill at the long-range operation of electronic warfare systems. 10% bonus to optimal range of ECM, Remote Sensor Dampers, Tracking Disruptors, Tracking Links, Remote Sensor Boosters and Target Painters per skill level.

Advanced understanding of signal waves. 10% bonus to falloff for ECM, Remote Sensor Dampeners, Tracking Disruptors, Remote Tracking Computers, Remote Sensor Boosters and Target Painters per skill level.
Skill at the operation of target jamming equipment. 5% bonus to strength of all ECM jammers per skill level.
Skill at the operation of remote sensor dampers. 5% bonus to remote sensor dampers' scan resolution and targeting range suppression per skill level.
Advanced understanding of tracking disruption technology. 5% bonus to Tracking Disruptor modules' tracking speed, optimal range and falloff disruption per skill level.
Skill at using target painters. 5% less capacitor need for target painters per skill level.
Advanced understanding of target painting technology. 5% bonus to target painter modules' signature radius multiplier per skill level.
Fake Skill to give the Stealth Bombers bonuses only to Cruise Missile Launchers.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced rocket launchers. 2% bonus per level to the rate of fire of modules requiring Rocket Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialist training in the operation of advanced light missile launchers and arrays. 2% bonus per level to the rate of fire of modules requiring Light Missile Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialist training in the operation of advanced heavy missile launchers. 2% bonus per level to the rate of fire of modules requiring Heavy Missile Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Specialist training in the operation of advanced cruise missile launchers. 2% bonus per level to the rate of fire of modules requiring Cruise Missile Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Specialist training in the operation of advanced siege launchers. 2% bonus per level to the rate of fire of modules requiring Torpedo Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Skill at precision missile homing. Proficiency at this skill increases the accuracy of a fired missile's exact point of impact, resulting in greater damage to small targets. 5% decrease per level in factor of signature radius for all missile explosions.
Proficiency at optimizing a missile's flight path to negate the effects of a target's speed upon the explosion's impact. 10% decrease per level in factor of target's velocity for all missiles.
Proficiency at upgrading missile warheads with deadlier payloads. 2% bonus to all missile damage per skill level.
Operation of capital energy turrets. 5% Bonus to capital energy turret damage per level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
The advanced operation of spaceships. Grants a 5% Bonus per skill level to the agility of ships requiring Advanced Spaceship Command. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Basic understanding of interfacing with Talocan technology. The Talocan were masters of Spatial manipulation and Hypereuclidean Mathematics. Allows the rudimentary use of Talocan components in the creation of advanced technology, even though the scientific theories behind them remain a mystery.

Basic proficiency at coordinating armored warfare. Grants a 2% bonus to fleet members' armor hit points per skill level.
Note: The fleet bonus only works if you are the assigned fleet booster and fleet members are in space within the same solar system.

Basic proficiency at coordinating information warfare. Grants a 2% bonus to fleet members' targeting range per skill level.
Note: The fleet bonus only works if you are the assigned fleet booster and fleet members are in space within the same solar system.
Skill at operating Amarr freighters. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Amarr dreadnoughts. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Caldari freighters. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Gallente freighters. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Minmatar freighters. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Caldari dreadnoughts. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Gallente dreadnoughts. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Minmatar dreadnoughts. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill for the operation of capital ships. Grants a 5% bonus per skill level to the agility of ships requiring the Capital Ships skill. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Improved skill for regulating energy flow to shields. 2% less capacitor need for shield boosters per skill level. Note: Has no effect on capital sized modules.
Proficiency at rapid missile launcher firing. 3% bonus to missile launcher rate of fire per level.
Skill at creating effective cynosural fields. 10% reduction in liquid ozone consumption for module activation per skill level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at regulating energy flow to the jump drive. 10% reduction in isotope consumption amount for jump drive operation per light year per skill level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Advanced skill at using Jump Drives. 20% increase in maximum jump range per skill level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Operation of capital hybrid turrets. 5% Bonus to capital hybrid turret damage per level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Operation of capital projectile turrets. 5% Bonus to capital projectile turret damage per level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at the handling and firing of citadel torpedoes. 5% bonus to citadel torpedo damage per skill level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Proficiency at breaking into guarded computer systems. Required skill for the use of Data Analyzer modules. Gives +10 Virus Coherence per level.

Basic understanding of interfacing with Sleeper technology. The Sleepers were masters of virtual reality, neural interfacing and cryotechnology. Allows the rudimentary use of Sleeper components in the creation of advanced technology, even though the scientific theories behind them remain a mystery.
Understanding of the data encryption methods used by the Caldari State and its allies.
Understanding of the data encryption methods used by the Minmatar Republic and its allies.
Operation of capital shield boosters and other shield modules. 2% reduction in capacitor need for capital shield boosters per skill level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Operation of capital armor/hull repair modules. 5% reduction in capital repair systems duration per skill level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at the operation of siege modules. 25-unit reduction in strontium clathrate consumption amount for module activation per skill level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
This skill currently has no effect.
Skill required for the manufacturing of standard and advanced capital ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Basic proficiency at coordinating mining operations. Grants a 2% bonus to fleet members' mining yield per level.
Note: The fleet bonus only works if you are the assigned fleet booster and fleet members are in space within the same solar system
Advanced proficiency at controlling mining drones. 3% Bonus to mining drone yield.
Skill for the operation of Exhumers. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Advanced proficiency at group mining. Boosts the effectiveness of mining foreman link modules by 20% per skill level.
Skill at using mining upgrades. 5% reduction per skill level in CPU penalty of mining upgrade modules.
Skill for the operation of Recon Ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
5% bonus to EM resistance per level for Armor Coatings and Energized Platings
5% bonus to explosive resistance per level for Armor Coatings and Energized Platings
5% bonus to kinetic resistance per level for Armor Coatings and Energized Platings
5% bonus to thermal resistance per level for Armor Coatings and Energized Platings
Allows operation of fighter craft. 20% increase in fighter damage per level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Understanding of the data encryption methods used by the Amarr Empire and its allies.
Understanding of the data encryption methods used by the Gallente Federation and its allies.

Basic understanding of interfacing with Takmahl technology. The Takmahl nation excelled in cybernetics and bio-engineering. Allows the rudimentary use of Takmahl components in the creation of advanced technology, even though the scientific theories behind them remain a mystery.

Basic understanding of interfacing with Yan Jung technology. The Yan Jung nation possessed advanced gravitronic technology and force field theories. Allows the rudimentary use of Yan Jung components in the creation of advanced technology, even though the scientific theories behind them remain a mystery.
This skill is required for the operation of Electronic Warfare Drones but also gives a bonus to the control range of all drones. 3,000m bonus drone control range per level.
Skill at controlling sentry drones. 5% bonus to Sentry Drone damage per level.
Specialization in the operation of advanced Amarr drones. 2% bonus to advanced Amarr drone damage per level.
Increases drone optimal range.
Increases drone hit points. 5% bonus to drone shield, armor and hull hit points per level.
Skill for the operation of Command Ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at controlling light combat drones. 5% bonus to damage of light drones per level.

Psychological training that strengthens the pilot's mental tenacity. The reality of having one's consciousness detached from one's physical form, scattered across the galaxy and then placed in a vat-grown clone can be very unsettling to the untrained mind. Allows 1 jump clone per level. Note: Clones can only be installed in stations with medical facilities or in ships with clone vat bays. Installed clones are listed in the character sheet.

Proficiency at starting manufacturing jobs remotely. Without this skill, one can only start jobs within the solar system where one is located. Each level increases the distance at which manufacturing jobs can be started. Level 1 allows for jobs at a range within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level adds 5 more jumps to the range, with a maximum of a 25 jump range.

Skill at running research operations remotely. Without this skill, one can only start jobs within the solar system where one is located. Each level increases the distance at which research projects can be started. Level 1 allows for jobs at a range within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level adds 5 more jumps to the range, with a maximum of a 25 jump range.
Skill at operating Amarr carriers. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Caldari carriers. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Gallente carriers. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Minmatar carriers. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill for the generation of jump portals to distant solar systems. 10% reduced material cost for jump portal activation per level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating titan doomsday weapons. 10% increased damage per level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Operation of capital sized remote armor repair systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for capital remote armor repair system modules per skill level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Operation of capital sized shield transfer array and other shield emission systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for capital shield emission system modules per skill level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Operation of capital remote capacitor transmitters and other capacitor emission systems. 5% reduced capacitor need of capital capacitor emission systems per skill level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Needed for use of the Clone Vat Bay module. Special: Increases a Clone Vat Bay's maximum clone capacity by 15% per skill level.
Allows the use of the Drone Control Unit module. One extra module can be fitted per skill level. Each fitted Drone Control Unit allows the operation of one extra drone.
Further training in the operation of multiple laboratories. Ability to run 1 additional research job per skill level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Further training in the operation of multiple factories. Ability to run 1 additional manufacturing job per skill level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Grants the Fleet Commander the ability to pass on their bonuses to an additional Wing per skill level, up to a maximum of 5 Wings. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

You are familiar with the intricacies of formalizing contracts between your corporation and other entities. For each level of this skill the number of concurrent corporation/alliance contracts you make on behalf of your corporation is increased by 10 up to a maximum of 60. This skill has no effect on contracts you make personally. There is no limit on the number of contracts a corporation can assign to itself. Corporations have a hard limit of 500 outstanding public contracts. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

This skill allows you to create formal agreements with other characters. For each level of this skill the number of outstanding contracts is increased by four (up to a maximum of 21 at level 5) This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Proficiency at biofeedback techniques intended to negate the side effects typically experienced upon injection of combat boosters.
Proficiency at reducing the severity of the side effects experienced upon injection of combat boosters.
Skill at harvesting gas clouds. Allows use of one gas cloud harvester per level.

Specialist training in the operation of advanced heavy assault missile launchers. 2% bonus per level to the rate of fire of modules requiring Heavy Assault Missile Specialization. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill with heavy assault missiles. Special: 5% bonus to heavy assault missile damage per skill level.
Skill for the advanced operation of long range scanners. 5% increase to scan probe strength per level.
Greater accuracy in hunting down targets found through scanning. Reduces maximum scan deviation by 5% per level.
Skill at the advanced operation of long range scanners. 5% reduction in scan probe scan time per level.
Proficiency at salvaging ship wrecks. Required skill for the use of salvager modules. 100% increase in chance of salvage retrieval per additional level.
Needed to manufacture boosters. Can not be trained on Trial Accounts. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

General understanding of the inner workings of starship components. Allows makeshift modifications to ship systems through the use of rigs. Required learning for further study in the field of rigging.
Advanced understanding of armor systems. Allows makeshift modifications to armor systems through the use of rigs. 10% reduction in Armor Rig drawbacks per level.

Advanced understanding of a ships navigational systems. Allows makeshift modifications to warp drive, sub warp drive and other navigational systems through the use of rigs. 10% reduction in Astronautics Rig drawbacks per level.
Advanced understanding of a ships drone control systems. Allows makeshift modifications to drone systems through the use of rigs. 10% reduction in Drone Rig drawbacks per level.

Advanced understanding of electronics systems. Allows makeshift modifications to targeting, scanning and ECM systems through the use of rigs. 10% reduction in Electronic Superiority Rig drawbacks per level.

Advanced understanding of the interface between projectile weapons and the numerous ship systems. Allows makeshift modifications to ship system architecture through the use of rigs. 10% reduction in Projectile Weapon Rig drawbacks per level.

Advanced understanding of the interface between energy weapons and the numerous ship systems. Allows makeshift modifications to ship system architecture through the use of rigs. 10% reduction in Energy Weapon Rig drawbacks per level.

Advanced understanding of the interface between hybrid weapons and the numerous ship systems. Allows makeshift modifications to ship system architecture through the use of rigs. 10% reduction in Hybrid Weapon Rig drawbacks per level.

Advanced understanding of the interface between Missile Launchers and the numerous ship systems. Allows makeshift modifications to ship system architecture through the use of rigs. 10% reduction in Launcher Rig drawbacks per level.
Advanced understanding of shield systems. Allows makeshift modifications to shield systems through the use of rigs. 10% reduction in Shield Rig drawbacks per level.
Operation of remote hull repair systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for remote hull repair system modules per skill level.
Skill at the operation of triage modules. 25-unit reduction in strontium clathrate consumption amount for module activation per skill level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Operation of projected ECM jamming systems. Each skill level gives a 5% reduction in module activation time. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Operation of capital class remote hull repair systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for capital class remote hull repair system modules per skill level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Basic operation of bomb delivery systems. 10% reduction of Bomb Launcher reactivation delay per skill level.

Advanced understanding of the laws of thermodynamics. Allows you to deliberately overheat a ship's modules in order to push them beyond their intended limit. Also gives you the ability to frown in annoyance whenever you hear someone mention a perpetual motion unit. Reduces heat damage by 5% per level.
Knowledge of the SCC tax regime and the ability to utilize that to one's own advantage. 2% reduction in SCC tax per level. Note: This skill does not apply to taxes imposed by player corporations.
Unknown
Skill at operating Capital Industrial Ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at the operation of industrial core modules. 50-unit reduction in heavy water consumption amount for module activation per skill level.
Skill at observating tournaments. +2 extra targets per skill level, up to the ship's maximum allowed number of targets locked.
Skill for operation of Heavy Interdiction Cruisers. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill for the operation of Electronic Attack Frigates. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Fake skill that specifies the owners security clearance for Imperial Navy facilities (e.g. acceleration gates).
Skill for the operation of Black Ops. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill for the operation of Marauders. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating nanites. 5% reduction in nanite consumption per level.
Improved control of general-purpose repair nanites, usually deployed in a paste form. 20% increase in damaged module repair amount per second.
Skill for operation of Jump Freighters. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating industrial command ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Understanding of the technology used to create advanced defensive subsystems.
Understanding of the technology used to create advanced engineering subsystems.
Understanding of the technology used to create advanced electronic subsystems.
Understanding of the technology used to create advanced offensive subsystems.
Skill in the operation of Amarr Defensive Subsystems used on Tech III ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill in the operation of Amarr Electronic Subsystems used on Tech III ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill in the operation of Amarr Offensive Subsystems used on Tech III ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill in the operation of Amarr Propulsion Subsystems used on Tech III ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill in the operation of Amarr Engineering Subsystems used on Tech III ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill in the operation of Gallente Defensive Subsystems used on Tech III ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill in the operation of Gallente Electronic Subsystems used on Tech III ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill in the operation of Caldari Electronic Subsystems used on Tech III ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill in the operation of Minmatar Electronic Subsystems used on Tech III ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill in the operation of Caldari Defensive Subsystems used on Tech III ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill in the operation of Minmatar Defensive Subsystems used on Tech III ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill in the operation of Gallente Engineering Subsystems used on Tech III ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill in the operation of Minmatar Engineering Subsystems used on Tech III ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill in the operation of Caldari Engineering Subsystems used on Tech III ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill in the operation of Caldari Offensive Subsystems used on Tech III ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill in the operation of Gallente Offensive Subsystems used on Tech III ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill in the operation of Minmatar Offensive Subsystems used on Tech III ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill in the operation of Caldari Propulsion Subsystems used on Tech III ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill in the operation of Gallente Propulsion Subsystems used on Tech III ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill in the operation of Minmatar Propulsion Subsystems used on Tech III ships. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Amarr Strategic Cruisers. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Caldari Strategic Cruisers. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Gallente Strategic Cruisers. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Minmatar Strategic Cruisers. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Understanding of the technology used to create advanced propulsion subsystems.
Allows operation of fighter bomber craft. 20% increase in fighter bomber damage per level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at the handling and firing of Citadel Cruise Missiles. 5% bonus to Citadel Cruise Missile damage per skill level. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.

Improves control over, and flow between, nano membranes that react to damage by shifting resistances. Reduces duration time of Reactive Armor Hardeners by 10% per level and capacitor need by 10% per level.
Skill at Tactical Strike Accuracy. Accuracy of Tactical Strike increased by 5% per level
Skill at operating ORE Mining Frigates.

Skill at hardening Magnetometric Sensors against hostile Electronic Counter Measure modules. 4% improved Magnetometric Sensor Strength per skill level. Magnetometric Sensors are primarily found on Gallente, Serpentis, ORE, and Sisters of EVE ships.

Skill at hardening Gravimetric Sensors against hostile Electronic Counter Measure modules. 4% improved Gravimetric Sensor Strength per skill level. Gravimetric Sensors are primarily found on Caldari, Guristas and Mordu's Legion ships.
Skill at hardening Ladar Sensors against hostile Electronic Counter Measure modules. 4% improved Ladar Sensor Strength per skill level. Ladar Sensors are primarily found on Minmatar and Angel ships.

Skill at hardening Radar Sensors against hostile Electronic Counter Measure modules. 4% improved Radar Sensor Strength per skill level. Radar Sensors are primarily found on Amarr, Blood Raider and Sanshas ships.
Skill at installing upgraded armor plates efficiently and securely, reducing the impact they have on agility and speed. Grants a 5% reduction to armor plate mass penalty per level.
Skill at operating Amarr destroyers.
Skill at operating Caldari destroyers.
Skill at operating Gallente destroyers.
Skill at operating Minmatar destroyers.
Skill at operating Amarr battlecruisers.
Skill at operating Caldari battlecruisers.
Skill at operating Gallente battlecruisers.
Skill at operating Minmatar battlecruisers.

Psychological training that strengthens the pilot's mental tenacity. Improved ability to synchronize with new clones allows pilots to jump-clone more frequently without risk of neural damage. Reduced time between clone jumps by 1 hour per level. Note: Clones can only be installed in stations with medical facilities or in ships with clone vat bays. Installed clones are listed in the character sheet.

Advanced training for those Capsuleers who want to push clone technology to its limits. Allows 1 additional jump clone per level. Note: Clones can only be installed in stations with medical facilities or in ships with clone vat bays. Installed clones are listed in the character sheet. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Expertise in cutting through the red tape of customs regulations. Reduces Import and Export empire tax in Customs Offices by 10% per level. This does not affect InterBus Customs Offices.
Skill at controlling medium combat drones. 5% bonus to damage of medium drones per level.
Skill for operation of Expedition Frigates. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating ORE freighters. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Amarr Tactical Destroyers. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
Skill at operating Minmatar Tactical Destroyers. This skill cannot be trained on Trial Accounts.
